name: studentblogapp
description: This project is a full-stack blog application for students, built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, post creation, commenting, and liking. It helps students learn full-stack development and backend integration.
author: Ehsan

comments.devScript: This uses nodemon to automatically restart the server during development.
comments.startScript: This runs the app in production mode using node.
